TopicTitle: Alt-click to duplicate parts/subassemblies in SPH/VAB

Articles.Content:
Perhaps it's just my Linux 0.21.1 x64 install, but I can't seem to use the old Alt-Click function to duplicate parts. It's a very useful function when creating asparagus staging, for example. Is this a bug on my end, or a deprecated feature?

edit: nevermind, thanks!

Edited July 27, 2013 by antbin
Right-Shift!
I can't speak for Linux, but that still works fine in Windows, so I think it's a bug, just not sure at which end.
It's a different key on linux. Alt is used by a lot of programs and linux itself for core shortcuts.

Perhaps it's just my Linux 0.21.1 x64 install, but I can't seem to use the old Alt-Click function to duplicate parts. It's a very useful function when creating asparagus staging, for example. Is this a bug on my end, or a deprecated feature?

antbin, use the RIGHT-SHIFT key as your mod key.

So RIGHT-SHIFT + click is what you want.
